feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
